text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The next day arrives with Taiki Shuttle<n>still believing she's
been scouted.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Thinking it wrong to recruit someone<n>based on a
misunderstanding, I set<n>out in hopes of breaking the news
to<n>her gently.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After a bit of searching, I find Taiki in<n>the courtyard with a
couple of other<n>students.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Gulp... Okay, Fukukitaru—readyas I'll ever be! Tell me what ya see inyour vision!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Sure thing! Here goes!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Pri-pri, mero-mero, starry-cup... O<n>great Shiraoki, bestow
upon me your<n>wisdom!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
...I've got it! Listen and be amazed,<n>Taiki! Your lucky
direction for this<n>month is... east-southeast!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Ooh, yes! That's just theanswer I needed, Fukukitaru!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
So Suzuka, let's have the party<n>somewhere to the
east-south-south...<n>east-east? Yeah!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
The east-southeast, wasn't it? I'm<n>not sure what direction
the<n>east-south-south-east-east would<n>be...

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Now, now—no use getting hung up on<n>the details!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Whatever the case, Suzuka, it's<n>gonna be a good time!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Come to my barbecue party, and I'll<n>feed ya till your body's
all soft and<n>squishy!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Th-that's a kind offer, but I'm not<n>sure I want to be soft and
squishy...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Either way, I'm really happy for you,<n>Taiki! Congratulations
on finding a<n>trainer!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Thanks, Fukukitaru! Hope to see ya<n>there too!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
I'm wanna invite as many friends as<n>I can. 'Cause ya
know what they<n>say—the more the happier!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Seeing Taiki chatting cheerfully with<n>her classmates, it's
plain to see that<n>she's a bright and friendly individual.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Howdy, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe. I just wanted to tell ya how<n>much I'm looking
forward to our<n>training session today!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
And, well... People tell me I can be a<n>smidge unfocused, but
don't ya<n>worry! I'm gonna give it the good ol'<n>college try!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her boundless enthusiasm makes it<n>all the more difficult to
turn her down.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: But a decision must be made...

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: You bet! Thanks for taking me under<n>your wing!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Thus, our first training session<n>together begins. However...

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Oh, Suzuka! Howdy!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ah, Taiki—wait, stop! Please don't<n>pounce on me, okay?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Oh! Well, that's too bad. Hugs are a<n>sign of affection, ya
know.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Yours are a bit like being hit by a<n>truck. Actually, aren't you
supposed<n>to be training right now?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Oh, I clean forgot!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Sorry for runnin' out on ya all of a<n>sudden, Trainer! Soon as
I spotted<n>Suzuka, my legs just sort of went off<n>on their
own.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Ooh, I know! Since you're here and<n>all, why don't we train
together,<n>Suzuka?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: What? W-well... Would that be all right<n>with you, Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Though completely unplanned, having<n>someone with Silence
Suzuka's talent<n>join our session would undoubtedly<n>
prove beneficial.
choice_data_list: Honestly, I'd consider it a favor.
Honestly, I'd consider it a favor.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Okay then. I was planning to do some<n>distance training
today, so would you<n>mind if we ventured off the school<n>
grounds?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Off the grounds?! That sounds like<n>fun!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: No problem at all! Let's go, go, go!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Hold on, Taiki. That was a question<n>for your trainer...

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Then it's off to the races!<n>Yeehaaaaaw!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Hey, wait! S-see you in a bit!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I wait at the school gate for them to<n>return, feeling only the
slightest bit<n>apprehensive. Eventually, I hear the<n>sound of
footsteps.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... We're back.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huh? Wait, what?! I was sure she<n>was right behind me!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
S-sorry! She has a habit of stopping<n>to talk to everyone she
meets, so I<n>meant to keep a close eye on her...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
But I have my own habit of getting<n>tunnel vision whenever I
run... I-I'm<n>really sorry!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Suzuka and I search all along the<n>running course for Taiki.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Bang! Yes, another bullseye!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Oh, I just heard her! I think she's<n>over this way!

text_block_list.name: Girl A
text_block_list.text: Ooh, me next! I wanna try! Show me<n>how it's done!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Just leave it to yours truly! Once ya<n>learn my sharpshootin'
skills, you'll<n>be just like a hero in a Western—toy<n>pistol or
not!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: There you are, Taiki! Thank goodness<n>we found you!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Oh, if it ain't Suzuka! And Trainer too!<n>Why're ya both so
out of breath?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Ohhh, sorry! I totally forgot I was in<n>the middle of running!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Taiki...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It seems the road ahead of us is<n>going to be quite the
bumpy one.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Well... I made some cute friends, so...<n>can ya p-please
forgive me this one<n>time?!
